title: Sever Connection Error
body:
I try to start a match and when there would usually be a loading screen with the champions I get a black screen and an error that says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network and attempt to reconnect to your game." My network connection is fine and I have tried turning off my Firewall along with my third party Firewall at the same time with the same results. I have even looked at topics on this and tried some of the solutions they had with no progress. I am a new player and I would really like to play this game but so far have not been able to. Help with this would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
I will provide any additional information if needed.

replies.body: A black screen like this usually indicates an issue with your network having trouble connecting to the game server.  Even if your internet is fine, ther emight be other issues that's preventing a strong connection.  Go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve your issue.  Hopefully, this will get you squared away and back in game!
I have already been through this and attempted most of these solutions with the same problem still occuring

Bummer!  No worries, we'd be happy to take a deeper look with your specific issue.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can dig into this.  I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to gather a set of logs, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!
